summary: This mod adds the popular character of Throthgar (featured in Tyrannicon's youtube series of Skyrim vids) as a fully voiced follower to the game, featuring the voice talent of Tyrannicon himself.
descriptionHtml:
25/05/2017: This mod is now available for Xbox One for Skyrim SE after kindly being ported by AlpineYJÂ https://bethesda.net/en/mods/skyrim/mod-detail/4017889

In collaboration with Tyrannicon, I proudly present Throthgar: A Fully Voiced Follower.
This mod adds the popular character of Throthgar (featured in Tyrannicon's youtube series of Skyrim vids) as a fully voiced follower to the game, featuring the voice talent of Tyrannicon himself.

PLEASE READ: This mod is designed to be used for a new game. This will ensure that he works as he should do. Also be sure to download the SEQ file.

You'll find him in the Sleeping Giant Inn at Riverwood. He is essential and will level with the player.

TROUBLE SHOOTING:
Make sure you download the SEQ file
After downloading the mod, wait at the launch screen for the data files to finish updating before starting the game.

If his dialogue doesn't appear then stand in front of him and quick save then load.

Make sure you have no other followers recruited when you talk to him. If you wish to use him with other followers then I would suggest using AFT: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?
I've tested it myself and he works well with any other followers if you use AFT. Just make sure AFT is below any followers in your load order.

Start a new game to make sure the scripts work as they should.

Make sure you have the latest update for Skyrim.

CREDITS: First and foremost, a massive thank you to Tyrannicon for teaming up with me to do this project. It was a lot of fun to do.

Next up a big thank you to Shodan44 for allowing others to use his edit of the Dragonplate helm. It wouldn't have been Throthgar without his legendary mask. Check it out here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7084/?

Finally, thank you to Nichevo/Deck 16 for his superb tutorial on adding voiced followers to the game. Check it out here: http://deck16.net/post/22645519500/making-a-unique-voiced-follower-in-skyrim-part-1

Enjoy!
author: Doc117
